subtitle: This one pot meal is quick, easy to make and saves on the washing up!

method.text: In a large frying pan or wok, heat the oil. Add the bacon. Cook for 3-4 min, until coloured. Drain off any excess liquid.
Add carrot and pepper. Cook for 2 min. Add bean sprouts and pineapple pieces.
Mix together the reserved pineapple juice with the sauce ingredients until smooth. Pour into the pan.
Stir fry for 2-3 min until ingredients are coated in the sauce and sauce is thickened slightly. Serve immediately.

title: Bacon and pineapple stir fry
